item.title: Setup
item.description: Making your own Quartz Setting up Quartz requires a basic understanding of git. If you are unfamiliar, this resource is a great place to start!

item.title: Editing Content in Quartz
item.description: Editing Quartz runs on top of Hugo so all notes are written in Markdown. Folder Structure Here’s a rough overview of what’s what.

item.title: Obsidian Vault Integration
item.description: Setup Obsidian is the preferred way to use Quartz. You can either create a new Obsidian Vault or link one that your already have.

item.title: Preview Changes
item.description: If you’d like to preview what your Quartz site looks like before deploying it to the internet, here’s exactly how to do that!

item.title: Deploying Quartz to the Web
item.description: Hosting on GitHub Pages Quartz is designed to be effortless to deploy. If you forked and cloned Quartz directly from the repository, everything should already be good to go!
CHIEF MCELROY HEAD ARTIFICER ‘HALFLING’ FEMALE If McElroy has a first name, either nobody ever uses it or it‚Äôs actually ‚ÄúChief.
IPSWITCH “SWITCH” DELACEY ILLUSIONIST SENSATION GNOME MALE Thin and pale, with their hair bleached platinum white, Ipswich ‚ÄúSwitch‚Äù DeLacey is a loud, extroverted bundle of energy.

JERRY MASTERS INTERIM CITY MAGISTRATE HUMAN MALE Jerry Masters used to lead the Gate‚Äôs elite guard, but he took the role of acting city magistrate when the city‚Äôs previous magistrate, Bai Zexian, vanished three years ago ‚Äì although it‚Äôs more accurate to say that everyone else stepped back.

SHELLY ADMINISTRATIVE NHP ASURA ‘FEMALE’ Shelly is Jerry‚Äôs former co-pilot, the ASURA-class NHP that came with his Sherman. Since it‚Äôs currently acting as an auxiliary mana storage for the Weaver, she took on a new role as Jerry‚Äôs assistant, aiding him in the monumental task of keeping the city afloat.
SIREN PILOT NHP ALKONOST ‘FEMALE’ Siren is an ALKONOST-class flight operations NHP, salvaged from a derelict SecComm strategic bomber just over two decades ago.

STRIGA VON ALDENBERG FELICITATIONS, COMRADES! ORC FEMALE Striga Von Aldenberg is the eccentric and paranoid leader of ‚ÄúThe Truth,‚Äù a tight clique of equally eccentric and paranoid sigdivers, vaguely aligned with Horizon.

ZINFANDEL DEJEAN MILITIA COMMANDER HUMAN MALE ‚ÄúZinfandel DeJean‚Äù likely isn‚Äôt their birth name, but this is the Long Rim. Folks out here often come up with names in a split second based on what they can see, so people tend to assume they either had a fun night in someone else‚Äôs cabin or got asked their name in a store that sold wine and trousers.

A long time ago, the Borealis had a job. Now it just has a hustle. No longer required to break through the Ice Plane and provide life-sustaining water, it‚Äôs been turned into a glittering vice district, a paradise for the weary traveler and a place where fortunes can be made or lost.
Part labour guild, part magic-socialist committee, part mutual aid group, Hell‚Äôs Gate Outpost works as hard as it can to meet the needs of the Gate‚Äôs people, and these needs are considerable.
Holval’s Kingdom The Truth Song: Hammer and Anvil

Igni Planar Trade Guild The Truth Originally a weapons manufacturer during the Long Rim‚Äôs initial land rush, Impact Dynamics engaged in a risky but ultimately successful pivot towards agriculture and hydrology when it turned out there were no habitable planets in Calliope.
Imperium of Man The Truth
There‚Äôs a riddle, a century and a half old: why are the elves so interested in Calliope? ^summary At first glance, it seems like a contradiction; the Conclave isn’t interested in Calliope.
The Union of Restoration
Witches, Warlocks, and Necromancers
CHAPTER 1 Cont. What tiny fragments remain of Andros Capella‚Äôs chassis drift lazily through the docking bay. All that‚Äôs left of the man is a carbon-black scorch mark on the deck plating.

item.title: Callouts
item.description: Callout support Quartz supports the same Admonition-callout syntax as Obsidian. This includes 12 Distinct callout types (each with several aliases) Collapsable callouts See documentation on supported types and syntax here.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Configuration Quartz is designed to be extremely configurable. You can find the bulk of the configuration scattered throughout the repository depending on how in-depth you’d like to get.

item.title: Custom Domain
item.description: Registrar This step is only applicable if you are using a custom domain! If you are using a <YOUR-USERNAME>.github.io domain, you can skip this step.

item.title: Ignoring Notes
item.description: Quartz Ignore Edit ignoreFiles in config.toml to include paths you’d like to exclude from being rendered. 1 2 3 4 5 6 .

item.title: Private Stuff
item.description: This page doesn’t get published!

item.title: Quartz Philosophy
item.description: ‚Äú[One] who works with the door open gets all kinds of interruptions, but [they] also occasionally gets clues as to what the world is and what might be important.

item.title: Search
item.description: Quartz supports two modes of searching through content. Full-text Full-text search is the default in Quartz. It produces results that exactly match the search query.

item.title: Showcase
item.description: Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens :) Quartz Documentation (this site!) Jacky Zhao’s Garden Scaling Synthesis - A hypertext research notebook AWAGMI Intern Notes Shihyu’s PKM Chloe’s Garden SlRvb’s Site Course notes for Information Technology Advanced Theory Brandon Boswell’s Garden Siyang’s Courtyard Data Dictionary üß† sspaeti.

item.title: Troubleshooting and FAQ
item.description: Still having trouble? Here are a list of common questions and problems people encounter when installing Quartz. While you’re here, join our Discord :)

item.title: Updating
item.description: Haven’t updated Quartz in a while and want all the cool new optimizations? On Unix/Mac systems you can run the following command for a one-line update!
